## Header 1

```{r setup}
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(fs)
source(here("R/functions.R"))
```


```{r}
#find similar patterns in files, to have a vector of all the files we need 
# usethis::use_package("purrr") --> to add dependencies
user_info_files <- dir_ls(here("data-raw/mmash/"), 
                          regexp = "user_info.csv", recurse = TRUE)
```


```{r}
#purrr is a part of tidyverse and we dont need to upload it usin librray cause it is already in depends
user_info_list_df <- map(user_info_files, import_user_info) |>
  list_rbind(names_to = "file_path_id")
user_info_list_df
```
